title: Setup Frontend Framework and Development Environment
description: Establish the Angular 17+ frontend framework with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for the Multi-Tenant Appointment Booking System. This includes setting up the project structure, development tools, and initial component architecture.

effort_estimate.justification: Setting up a modern frontend framework with proper tooling and structure requires configuration of build systems, styling frameworks, and initial project organization. This establishes the foundation for all UI development.

user_stories: As a frontend developer, I want a modern framework so that I can build responsive UIs efficiently
As a designer, I need a consistent styling system so that the UI looks professional and cohesive
business_rules: Angular 17+ must be used as the primary framework
Tailwind CSS must be implemented for styling
Responsive design principles must be followed

acceptance_criteria: Angular 17+ project is created with proper structure
Tailwind CSS is configured and working
Development environment is set up with linting and formatting
Component architecture follows design system principles

blocking_information.blocking_reason: Project structure must be established first to place frontend files in the correct locations

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow the frontend architecture from the UI requirements and LLD documents. Implement a component-based approach with proper separation of concerns. Ensure responsive design from the beginning.
additional_context.design_references: UI requirements documentation and component library specification
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper input sanitization and XSS protection in frontend components
